Django CassandraTestCase¶

Django TestCase which starts Cassandra server on the first setUp and reloads data for every test case

class pysandraunit.django.CassandraTestCase(methodName='runTest')¶
exception pysandraunit.django.CassandraTestCaseConfigException¶
django settings.py options

PYSANDRA_SCHEMA_FILE_PATH = ‘path_to_schema’

PYSANDRA_TMP_DIR = ‘/tmp/path’ – default is /dev/shm or /tmp

PYSANDRA_RPC_PORT = 9171

PYSANDRA_NATIVE_TRANSPORT_PORT = 9142

PYSANDRA_CASSANDRA_YAML_OPTIONS = {} – optional params passed to Cassandra via cassandra.yaml file
